entry.title: Current Conditions: 6.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: University of Victoria 07:00 AM PST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 9. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers changing to 70 percent chance of showers near noon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this afternoon. High 9. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Sunday 15 January 2023
